sentence: The Dow Jones Industrial Average is slumping Thursday afternoon with shares of Apple Inc. and Salesforce.com Inc. seeing the biggest losses for the blue-chip average.

Apple Inc.'s shares have dropped $8.88, or 6.8%, while those of Salesforce.com Inc. are off $17.41 (6.3%), combining for a roughly 173-point drag on the Dow.
Also contributing significantly to the decline are Microsoft MSFT, , Home Depot HD, , and Amgen Inc. AMGN, .
